response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth significantly more than its actual cost to us. Considering its value, I'm offering it to you for $120. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide you with an excellent deal while ensuring we cover our costs and make a fair profit. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.", "product_price": 120}
